goal: Alber & Geiger is a political lobbying powerhouse, a leading European government relations law firm and a top CJEU litigation firm. We assist our clients with lobbying, diplomacy and EU litigation services.

euInitiatives: All policies directly and indirectly linked to remote and land-based games of chance in Europe.
